info.title: Bank Card Contract Lock Request
info.description:
A request to maintain locks on product features and transactions of a bank card contract. A Bank Card Contract is based on an event type which can be maintained in customizing. This event type defines which objects can be locked and some default values. You can use this API to create, query, read or update locks.

Note:
A Bank Card Contract is a contract between a credit institute and customer, which is based on the request of a customer to have a bank card for their bank account and consists among others, the bank card type, card holder, general terms and conditions. A Bank Card Contract Lock Request can be used for business events like locking renewal of the card. A prerequisite of the API is that business partner data is available in same system as the bank card contracts.

Remark:
The service Bank Card Contract Lock Request is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

x-sap-shortText: Manage requests of the card holder to lock a bank card contract immediately or in the future

ID.title: Is an identifier of a bank card contract lock request.
ID.description: Special characters like "-", "_", "*", "/" are not allowed.

PartyIdentifyingElements.title: PartyIdentifyingElements contains all the identifying elements of a bank customer.

ChangeStateID.description: Remark: Property is required for subsequent usage of update service. GDT: ChangeStateID

EventCode.title: A coded representation of the event of a bank card contract lock request.
EventCode.description: Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. BDT: BankContractLockRequestEventCode

UserStatusCode.title: A coded representation of the user status of a bank contract lock request.
UserStatusCode.description:
A user status is a user defined processing status of a bank contract lock request. Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.

BDT: BankContractLockRequestUserStatusCode

ValidityEndDate.title: The validity end date for a bank contract lock request.

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.

Note.title: A note on bank contract lock request about the lock.
